description: The image captures a lively indoor buffet scene, likely at a corporate event or gathering, set against a backdrop of a warm, reddish-brown brick wall. In the foreground, several open pizza boxes are arranged on a black-clothed table, displaying rectangular pepperoni and cheese pizzas with golden-brown crusts; white paper plates hold individual slices, ready to be served. To the left, a wooden sideboard holds a basket of breadsticks and a tray of fresh vegetables like celery and carrots, alongside a bowl of white dip. A man in a light blue shirt, dark vest, and tie stands behind the food, pointing toward the right with a serious expression, while another man in a grey vest and gloves, wearing a pink watch, stands beside him, seemingly preparing to serve. The lighting is bright and even, typical of indoor event spaces, highlighting the vibrant reds of the pepperoni, the creamy white of the cheese and dip, and the green of the vegetables. The composition is dynamic, with the diagonal line of the pizza boxes leading the eye across the frame, while the figures in the background add a sense of activity and purpose to the scene.

vision_response.description: The image captures a lively indoor buffet scene, likely at a corporate event or gathering, set against a backdrop of a warm, reddish-brown brick wall. In the foreground, several open pizza boxes are arranged on a black-clothed table, displaying rectangular pepperoni and cheese pizzas with golden-brown crusts; white paper plates hold individual slices, ready to be served. To the left, a wooden sideboard holds a basket of breadsticks and a tray of fresh vegetables like celery and carrots, alongside a bowl of white dip. A man in a light blue shirt, dark vest, and tie stands behind the food, pointing toward the right with a serious expression, while another man in a grey vest and gloves, wearing a pink watch, stands beside him, seemingly preparing to serve. The lighting is bright and even, typical of indoor event spaces, highlighting the vibrant reds of the pepperoni, the creamy white of the cheese and dip, and the green of the vegetables. The composition is dynamic, with the diagonal line of the pizza boxes leading the eye across the frame, while the figures in the background add a sense of activity and purpose to the scene.
vision_response.prompt_used: Describe what you see in this image. Include the setting, main elements, colors, lighting, and overall composition. Be specific and detailed. Form the response as a continuous paragraph. Maximum 200 words.

results.cli_command: hedit annotate "The image captures a lively indoor buffet scene, l..." --model openai/gpt-oss-120b --eval-model qwen/qwen3-235b-a22b-2507 --eval-provider Cerebras --schema 8.4.0 --max-attempts 5 -o json --standalone --assessment --provider Cerebras

full_response.hed_string: Sensory-event, Experimental-stimulus, Visual-presentation, (Wall, (Color, Color/Reddish-brown)), (Item/Table, (Color, Black), (Contains, (Item/Pizza-box, (Contains, (Item/Pizza, (Topping, Pepperoni), (Topping, Cheese), (Crust, Color/Brown), (Shape, Rectangular)), (Item/Plate, (Color, White))))), (Item/Sideboard, (Color, Wood), (To-left-of, (Item/Table)), (Contains, (Item/Basket, (Contains, (Item/Breadsticks)))), (Contains, (Item/Tray, (Contains, (Item/Vegetable, Celery), (Item/Vegetable, Carrot)))), (Contains, (Item/Bowl, (Contains, (Item/Dip, (Color, White))))), ((Human-agent, Label/Person), (Clothing/Shirt, (Color, LightBlue)), (Clothing/Vest, (Color, Black)), (Clothing/Tie), (Point, (Direction, Right))), ((Human-agent, Label/Person), (Clothing/Vest, (Color, Grey)), (Item/Watch, (Color, Pink)), (Action/Serve))

metadata.evaluation_feedback:
FAITHFUL: yes  
GROUPING: correct  
DECISION: ACCEPT  

FEEDBACK:  
- The HED annotation accurately captures the core elements of the scene: the visual event type, main objects (pizza boxes, sideboard, people), their properties, spatial relationships, and key actions.  
- Semantic grouping is correctly applied: object properties (e.g., color, contents) are properly nested within parentheses with their respective items, avoiding flat or ambiguous structures.  
- Key details such as clothing colors, food items, spatial layout (To-left-of), and actions (Point, Serve) are included with appropriate labeling.  
- The use of (Human-agent, Label/Person) for both individuals is acceptable, and their distinguishing features (clothing, watch, actions) are clearly specified.  
- The annotation preserves the dynamic composition and sensory richness of the original description and would support a reasonable reconstruction in natural language.  

No refinement needed—this is a well-structured, faithful HED annotation.

Reversibility is compromised due to ambiguous groupings.
